# Conference Presentations

## Oral Presentations

```{r oral_presentations}
vroom::vroom('data/presentations.csv') %>% 
  dplyr::filter(display == T & type == 'oral') %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(when)) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(when, what = with, with = what, where)
```

## Poster Presentations

```{r poster_presentations}
vroom::vroom('data/presentations.csv') %>% 
  dplyr::filter(display == T & type == 'poster') %>%

```
